intro:
A happy life of living together. I thought it was going well all this time.
Let's start over. Let's go back to six months ago...
description:
She is laughing. Next to a man I don't know.
I thought things were going well all this time.
Let's start over. Let's go back to six months ago...


Yuki Miyoshi is just an ordinary office worker
He lived with his girlfriend Chihiro Komanoma and lived a happy life.

One day, Yuki gets into a traffic accident and runs over his best friend Takeya with his car.
Fortunately, it wasn't anything serious, and they settled the matter by having Chihiro take care of him.
However, Takeya woos Chihiro and asks her out on a date while she is caring for him.

Yuki, who happened to witness the date, was knocked unconscious by a car during his state of shock.

When he woke up, he was in his home 6 months in the past.
To stop Chihiro's infidelity, Yuki relives those 6 months.


◆Characters
Chihiro Komanoma
Yuki's girlfriend who lives with him.
Yuki hasn't been giving her much attention lately, so she opened her heart to Takeya.

Uta Komanoma 
Chihiro's energetic younger sister.
She notices Yuki's strange behavior and helps him out, but she is drawn to Yuki's charm in the process.

Riko Kotozato
Yuki's attentive junior at work.
Unaware that Yuki has a girlfriend, she is secretly targeting Yuki.

Yuki Miyoshi
An ordinary office worker who lives with Chihiro.
He causes a traffic accident and runs over Takeya, but agrees to a settlement on the condition that Chihiro will nurse him to health.
